content.en: AI-enhanced forecasting: Researchers have been exploring how artificial intelligence (AI) approaches can improve demand forecasting and supply chain management. They have found that algorithms such as artificial neural networks, adaptive network-based fuzzy inference systems, support vector machines, and deep learning models can enhance the accuracy of demand forecasting. These algorithms analyze large amounts of data and make predictions, helping businesses better manage their inventory and meet customer demands.
content.da: AI-forbedret prognose: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan kunstig intelligens (AI) metoder kan forbedre efterspørgselsprognoser og supply chain management. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer såsom kunstige neurale netværk, adaptivt netværksbaserede fuzzy inference-systemer, support vector maskiner, og deep learning-modeller kan øge nøjagtigheden af efterspørgselsprognoser. Disse algoritmer analyserer store mængder data og laver forudsigelser, hvilket hjælper virksomheder med bedre at håndtere deres lagerbeholdning og imødekomme kundernes efterspørgsel.
